title: Bug 18163: Add Import should ignore leading/trailing whitespace
description: When using the 'Add Import' feature, it fails to work when there's trailing whitespace in the selection.
OB: When selecting text using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right' and then attempting to use 'Ctrl+M' (Add Import), the feature does not work as expected.
EB: The 'Add Import' feature should work correctly when there's trailing whitespace in the selected text. It should ignore the whitespace and add the import statement as needed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Select some text using 'Shift + Ctrl + Right', ensuring there's trailing whitespace in the selection.
2. Press 'Ctrl+M' to trigger the 'Add Import' feature.
3. Observe that the feature does not add the import statement as expected.
